DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate safety efficacy Patupilone adult patient advance solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Patupilone Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors Japan
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients histologically/cytologically confirm diagnosis advance solid tumor refractory unsuitable standard therapy , standard therapy exist Patients WHO Performance Status 01 ( Karnofsky Performance Status 80100 ) At least one measurable lesion Exclusion criterion : Patients peripheral neuropathy Patients unresolved diarrhea Patients severe and/or uncontrolled medical condition infection require systemic therapy Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
